mapper.select:
select count(*) from sportlist
where sfnm like '%'||#{slist_word}||'%'
and regexp_like(scate,#{sport})
and regexp_like(dongcate,#{dong_one})

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from sportlist
where sfnm like '%'||#{slist_word}||'%'
and regexp_like(scate,#{sport})
and regexp_like(dongcate,#{dong_one})
order by sfno asc) a) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into sportpick (spickno, id, sfno, spickyn, spickdate) select sportpick_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{sfno}, #{spickyn}, sysdate from dual where not exists( select 1 from sportpick where id=#{id} and sfno=#{sfno})
mapper.select: select count(*) from sportpick where id=#{id} and sfno=#{sfno}
select * from sportpick where sfno=#{sfno} order by spickdate desc
mapper.update: update sportlist set stotalstar = coalesce( (select sum(sstar) from sportreview where sportreview.sfno = sportlist.sfno group by sfno), 0)
update sportlist set stotalpeo = coalesce( (select count(srecontent) from sportreview where sportreview.sfno = sportlist.sfno group by sfno), 0)
mapper.select: select * from sportreview where sfno=#{sfno} order by sredate desc
mapper.insert:
select sportreview_seq.nextval from dual
insert into sportreview values (#{sreno},#{sfno},#{id},#{srecontent},sysdate,#{sstar})
mapper.update: update sportreview set srecontent=#{srecontent},sredate=sysdate where sreno=#{sreno}
